snippet: Shaun Livingston scored 23 points, Mirza Teletovic made six 3-pointers and added 20, and the Brooklyn Nets beat the Detroit Pistons 116-104 on Friday night to extend their home winning streak to 15 games....

headline.print_headline: Nets Use 3-Point Attack to Beat Pistons 116-104
headline.main: Nets Use 3-Point Attack to Beat Pistons 116-104

lead_paragraph: Shaun Livingston scored 23 points, Mirza Teletovic made six 3-pointers and added 20, and the Brooklyn Nets beat the Detroit Pistons 116-104 on Friday night to extend their home winning streak to 15 games.
